verses.t: The word{H1697} Lordof the {H3068} came again unto me, saying{H559},
Son{H1121} of man{H120}, set{H7760} thy face{H6440} against the Ammonites{H5983}, and prophesy{H5012}

And say{H559} unto the Ammonites{H5983}, Hear{H8085} the word{H1697} of the Lord{H136} God; Thus saith{H559} the Lord{H136} God; Because thou saidst{H559}, Aha{H1889}, against my sanctuary{H4720}, when it was profaned{H2490}; and against the land{H127} of Israel{H3478}, when it was desolate{H8074}; and against the house{H1004} of Judah{H3063}, when they went{H1980} into captivity{H1473};

Behold, therefore I will deliver{H5414} thee to the men{H1121} of the east{H6924} for a possession{H4181}, and they shall set{H3427} their palaces{H2918} in thee, and make{H5414} their dwellings{H4908} in thee: they shall eat{H398} thy fruit{H6529}, and they shall drink{H8354} thy milk{H2461}.men: Heb. children
And I will make{H5414} Rabbah{H7237} a stable{H5116} for camels{H1581}, and the Ammonites{H5983} a couchingplace{H4769} for flocks{H6629}: and ye shall know{H3045} that I am Lordthe {H3068}.

For thus saith{H559} the Lord{H136} God; Because thou hast clapped{H4222} thine hands{H3027}, and stamped{H7554} with the feet{H7272}, and rejoiced{H8055} in heart{H5315} with all thy despite{H7589} against the land{H127} of Israel{H3478};hands: Heb. handfeet: Heb. footheart: Heb. soul

Behold, therefore I will stretch out{H5186} mine hand{H3027} upon thee, and will deliver{H5414} thee for a spoil{H897} to the heathen{H1471}; and I will cut thee off{H3772} from the people{H5971}, and I will cause thee to perish{H6} out of the countries{H776}: I will destroy{H8045} thee; and thou shalt know{H3045} that I am Lordthe {H3068}.a spoil: or, meat
Thus saith{H559} the Lord{H136} God; Because{H3282} that Moab{H4124} and Seir{H8165} do say{H559}, Behold, the house{H1004} of Judah{H3063} is like unto all the heathen{H1471};

Therefore, behold, I will open{H6605} the side{H3802} of Moab{H4124} from the cities{H5892}, from his cities{H5892} which are on his frontiers{H7097}, the glory{H6643} of the country{H776}, Beth–jeshimoth{H1020}, Baal–meon{H1186}, and Kiriathaim{H7156},side…: Heb. shoulder of Moab

Unto the men{H1121} of the east{H6924} with the Ammonites{H5983}, and will give{H5414} them in possession{H4181}, that the Ammonites{H5983} may not be remembered{H2142} among the nations{H1471}.with…: or, against the children of Ammon
And I will execute{H6213} judgments{H8201} upon Moab{H4124}; and they shall know{H3045} that I am Lordthe {H3068}.

Thus saith{H559} the Lord{H136} God; Because that Edom{H123} hath dealt{H6213} against the house{H1004} of Judah{H3063} by taking{H5358} vengeance{H5359}, and hath greatly{H816} offended{H816}, and revenged{H5358} himself upon them;by…: Heb. by revenging revengement

Therefore thus saith{H559} the Lord{H136} God; I will also stretch out{H5186} mine hand{H3027} upon Edom{H123}, and will cut off{H3772} man{H120} and beast{H929} from it; and I will make{H5414} it desolate{H2723} from Teman{H8487}; and they of Dedan{H1719} shall fall{H5307} by the sword{H2719}.they…: or, they shall fall by the sword unto Dedan

And I will lay{H5414} my vengeance{H5360} upon Edom{H123} by the hand{H3027} of my people{H5971} Israel{H3478}: and they shall do{H6213} in Edom{H123} according to mine anger{H639} and according to my fury{H2534}; and they shall know{H3045} my vengeance{H5360}, saith{H5002} the Lord{H136} God.

Thus saith{H559} the Lord{H136} God; Because the Philistines{H6430} have dealt{H6213} by revenge{H5360}, and have taken{H5358} vengeance{H5359} with a despiteful{H7589} heart{H5315}, to destroy{H4889} it for the old{H5769} hatred{H342};for the…: or, with perpetual hatred

Therefore thus saith{H559} the Lord{H136} God; Behold, I will stretch out{H5186} mine hand{H3027} upon the Philistines{H6430}, and I will cut off{H3772} the Cherethims{H3774}, and destroy{H6} the remnant{H7611} of the sea{H3220} coast{H2348}.sea coast: or, haven of the sea

And I will execute{H6213} great{H1419} vengeance{H5360} upon them with furious{H2534} rebukes{H8433}; and they shall know{H3045} that I am Lordthe {H3068}, when I shall lay{H5414} my vengeance{H5360} upon them.great vengeance: Heb. great vengeances
